./.title: About Amemori
./.body: About Amemori Through the Amemori AI technology, users can not only repair low-resolution, creased and old photos, colorize black and white photos, but also enhance the scenery of people in high-definition, generate dynamic expressions, cartoon expressions and various artistic photos. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-04-21

About Amemori/AI filter.html.title: AI filter
About Amemori/AI filter.html.body: AI filter We currently provide five styles of AI filters, namely AI beauty style, CG style, American comics style, Halloween style, Cartoon style, you can choose according to your preferences. Each filter can crop the image while editing. AI Beauty CG American comics Halloween Cartoon Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-04-24

About Amemori/Enhance.html.title: Enhance
About Amemori/Enhance.html.body: Enhance When you need to optimize the network compressed pictures, or want to repair the blurred pictures caused by improper operation during shooting, or want to repair the old photos with low resolution, you can complete the repair and enhancement of the pictures by using amemori's image repair filter. The image enhancement function can repair or color the image. You can also color the image while completing the image repair. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-04-21

About Amemori/Animating.html.title: Animating
About Amemori/Animating.html.body: Animating Amemori not only has AI filters, but our team has also introduced dynamic filters that can change facial expressions and character backgrounds. You can use this filter to move the character's facial expression or character background, or it is also possible to make them move at the same time. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-04-24

About Amemori/How does NFT work with Ame.url: About Amemori/How does NFT work with Amemori.html
About Amemori/How does NFT work with Ame.title: How does NFT work with Amemori
About Amemori/How does NFT work with Ame.body: How does NFT work with Amemori We've simplified the process of transforming your art into NFT directly from the Amemori app. 1、Create an artwork using Enhance+ or AI Filter. Our most advanced AI-powered photo tool will help you create a stunning artwork. 2、 Publish your artwork & mint NFT for free. Your art will be minted for free and green on Polygon, a layer 2 solution built on top of Ethereum. If you want to mint to your own wallet, then provide your own wallet address (e.g. copy-paste from MetaMask). 3、Viewing, trading and selling your NFTs on OpenSea When you minted NFTs for your artwork, they're automatically listed on Opensea. You can also see, sell or trade the NFT on OpenSea under your account (if you minted to your own wallet) or at Amemori collection. It usually takes a few minutes for OpenSea to update its database. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-06-15

Mint an NFT/.title: Mint an NFT
Mint an NFT/.body: Mint an NFT With the most advanced technology based on artificial intelligence, amemori has created digital assets mainly operated by entities in real time. At present, our team has produced two NFT series. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-09

Mint an NFT/Hoodie Frens.html.title: Hoodie Frens
Mint an NFT/Hoodie Frens.html.body: Hoodie Frens Hoodie Frens is a collection of 8,748 unique, AI-generated NFTs, offering exclusive memberships to a worldwide community of NFT Creators. We’ve developed algorithms that will allow you to generate personalized Hoodies. Hoodie Frens collection will algorithmically generate your unique avatar that is abstracted from your physical identity. How to Claim & Mint your Hoodie Frens for free: STEP 1 Download Amemori App for iPhone. There will be a Hoodie Frens banner for the minting page. STEP 2 Enter the minting page and generate your unique Hoodies. The claiming of NFTs happens through a mystery box random algorithm. STEP 3 You can press the “Random” button to generate more random Hoodies, and each task will require 1 free Coin. STEP 4 Click the “Publish NFT” button to enter the NFT minting page. Enter your wallet address (e.g. copy-paste from MetaMask) and click “Publish”. Your NFT will be minted for free and green on Polygon. STEP 5 Viewing, trading and selling your NFTs on OpenSea. The remainder of the NFT drop becomes available for an open public pre-sale to the rest of the market. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-07

Mint an NFT/Crypto Queenie.html.title: Crypto Queenie
Mint an NFT/Crypto Queenie.html.body: Crypto Queenie Crypto Queenie is a collection of 3532 unique, AI-generated NFTs that are symbolic of women who have stood up to discrimination, objectification, prosecution and violence. Crypto Queenie generates 49 arbitrary art styles of 6 typical women portraits via AI generation models. Users can choose from 16 kinds of effects including 4 super rare sketches. How To Free Mint Your First Queenie STEP 1 Download Amemori App for iPhone. STEP 2 Add your wallet address on " me " (your profile) Then there will be a Crypto Queenie banner for the minting page. STEP 3 Enter the minting page. If you get whitelisted, you can generate and mint your unique Queenies. The claiming of NFTs happens through a mystery box random algorithm. STEP 4 You can press the “Random” button to get more random Queenies; then you can press the “Effects” to choose from 5 random kinds of effects, and each task will require 1 free coin. Click the “Publish NFT” button, and your NFT will be minted for free and green on Polygon. STEP 5 Viewing, trading and selling your NFTs on OpenSea. The remainder of the NFT drop becomes available for an open public pre-sale to the rest of the market. How to check if NFT is already in my wallet? Once your NFT is published, you can check your NFT address on the NFT catalogue page. You can also check your NFT on your Opensea profile. Go to opensea.io, open your profile, swipe right and look for the ‘hidden’ tab. That’s where your NFTs will be placed. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-07

User manual/.title: User manual
User manual/.body: User manual Here you can learn everything you want. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-09

User manual/Earn coins.html.title: Earn coins
User manual/Earn coins.html.body: Earn coins Coin is particularly important in Amemori. It is consumed not only when using AI filter, but also when you mint your unique NFT. How to get coins for free in Amemori ? 1、Receive daily rewards 2、Recommend Amemori to your friends 3、Share your pictures 4、Follow Amemori's instagram Click to enter the coin page. After completing the above four tasks, you can get the corresponding coins reward. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-09

User manual/Membership system.html.title: Membership system
User manual/Membership system.html.body: Membership system If you want to have the experience of unlimited access, priority queuing, no watermark and no advertising, come and join our members. How to become our member? We have three membership systems，you can choose the most suitable one according to your needs. 1、$1.99/week 2、$3.99/month 3、$20.99/year Click to enter the membership page. After selecting the membership duration, you can join our membership by purchasing directly. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-04-24

User manual/Airdrops.html.title: Airdrops
User manual/Airdrops.html.body: Airdrops Welcome to the airdrop event, each airdrop will issue NFT prizes and NFT Pass. As long as you join in the airdrop, you will have the opportunity to win exquisite prizes. Airdrop activity rules are as follows : 1、Airdrops are available weekly for each user, click the link and you can participate. 2、The airdrop closes shortly after meet the participator number requirements. If you're selected, you can claim the NFT. At the same time, send the received NFT mint to your address. If you're not selected, you can claim the NFT Pass. 3、When the airdrop be claimed, the last few 1/1 super-rare NFTs will be released, at which point 1/1s will be officially OUT OF PRINT. Thus, 1/1s can only be obtained from secondmarket. Click the button below to participate in the airdrop event. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-19

User manual/NFT Pass.html.title: NFT Pass
User manual/NFT Pass.html.body: NFT Pass What is an NFT Pass ? When you have successfully created your own exquisite NFT and you want to publish it, you need to consume NFT Pass every time. How to get NFT Pass for free in Amemori ? 1、Participate in external activities 2、Become our user for daily check-in 3、Become an Amemori NFT holders Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-05-09

Discord Bot/.title: Discord Bot
Discord Bot/.body: Discord Bot Discord bot can realize AI robot painting, select or input some keywords to generate unique and exquisite paintings. You can draw AI in two ways. First method : select keywords for painting. How to select keywords for painting? Step 1 enter! button Step 2 select keywords Step 3: the painting is generated successfully Second method : input keywords for painting. How to input keywords for painting? Step 1 enter /image and add keywords Note that you need to enter a space between the instruction /image and the keyword. Step 2 wait for AI robot to paint Wait until the painting is loaded, and the painting progress will be displayed in real time. When the process is displayed as 100%, the painting is generated successfully. Step 3: the painting is generated successfully Click the link to download the original drawing using keywords. Enter Amemori quickly and use AI Art to create. Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-06-27

Discord Bot中文/.title: Discord Bot中文
Discord Bot中文/.body: Discord Bot中文 discord Bot能够实现AI机器人作画，选择或者输入一些关键词生成独一无二的精美画作。 你能够使用两种方式进行AI作画 第一种方式：选择关键字进行作画 如何选择关键字进行作画？ 第一步 输入!button 第二步 选择关键字 第三步 画作生成成功 第二种方式：输入关键字进行作画 如何输入关键字进行作画？ 第一步 输入/image 加上关键字 注意在指令 /image 与关键字之间需要输入空格分隔开。 第二步 等待AI机器人作画 等待画作加载完成，作画进度会实时进行显示。 当进程显示为100%时，画作生成成功。 第三步 画作生成成功 点击链接就能够下载使用关键字进行作画的原图。 快点进入Amemori，使用AI Art进行创作吧。 Copyright © www.amemori.com all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Modified time 2022-06-27
